      • addMeasuredVariable

        @POST
 @Path(value="/add-measured-variable")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addMeasuredVariable(@QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String name,
                                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="unit")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String unit,
                                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="period")
                                                                                                    double period,
                                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="min-quality")
                                                                                                    int min_quality,
                                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="max-quality")
                                                                                                    int max_quality)
        Add time series meta-data. This method creates a measured variable (e.g., temperature) defined by its name and unit and configures a time series period and quality thresholds.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the measured variable.
        unit - Unit of measurement.
        period - Sampling period of the time series.
        min_quality - Min quality of the time series.
        max_quality - Max quality of the time series.
        Returns:

      • addObservations

        @POST
 @Path(value="/add-observations")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response addObservations(@QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                           java.lang.String name,
                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="file-name")
                                                                                           java.lang.String file_path)
        Import observations from a CSV file that contains exactly one time series with the following columns: timestamp, value, quality (in that order).
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the measured variable linked to the time series.
        file_path - Path of a CSV file with columns: timestamp, value, quality.
        Returns:
